title: Bloomberg Markets: Tucker Says M&A Part of Organic Growth
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Tucker Says M&A Part of Organic Growth
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Giles Tucker Managing Director Harris Williams Discussing mergers and acquisitions outlook and comments on General Electric's management change.
